body:
FreeBSD 10.1, almost stock, but I've added `mdns`! I use [Apple's mDNSResponder](https://www.freshports.org/dns/mDNSResponder_nss/) for zeroconf `*.local` on FreeBSD.

```
#
# nsswitch.conf(5) - name service switch configuration file
# $FreeBSD: releng/10.1/etc/nsswitch.conf 224765 2011-08-10 20:52:02Z dougb $
#
group: compat
group_compat: nis
hosts: files dns mdns
networks: files
passwd: compat
passwd_compat: nis
shells: files
services: compat
services_compat: nis
protocols: files
rpc: files
```
